    Toyota Corolla Cross Car Glasses Storage Holder Box Installation

    A step-by-step guide on installing a glasses storage holder box in a Toyota Corolla Cross by replacing the driver’s seat handle.

    less than 1 minute read

    1. Home
      2. /
    2. Automotive
      3. /
    3. Diy
      4. /
    4. Toyota Corolla Cross Car Glasses Storage Holder Box Installation

    Matthew Choo

    With 20 years in market research across Telco and Media, I’ve decoded consumer behavior, optimized research, and driven data-led strategies.     • Email

    Toyota Corolla Cross has limited storage space.

    As there is a handle on top of the driver’s seat, this can be replaced with Sunglass storage.

    1. Use the L-shape screwdriver on the small hole and open the case

    2. After opening, pinch the silver clip to detach the handle from the car roof.

    3. Pinch the silver clip to detach the clip from the car roof

    4. Put the glass storage in place, and push the provided pin in the holes. DONE

    Outcome pictures

    Tags: Car Accessories, Car Modifications, DIY Installation, Storage, Toyota Corolla Cross

    Categories: Automotive, DIY
